report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-24099 Adobe Photoshop Font Parsing Out-Of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-24099 Adobe Photoshop Font Parsing Out-Of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
text: Adobe Photoshop could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an out-of-bounds read. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.
